attributes.action: Table a vote of no confidence in John Bercow, Speaker of the House of Commons.
attributes.background:
For  a Speaker, who by his nature is a remainer, to block amendments that have a direct consequence on the outcome of votes in the House is disgusting.
It is time for John Bercow to go.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence.
